channel.title: Hammerspoon on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Hammerspoon on zzamboni.org

item.title: Fixing the Outlook-to-OmniFocus Script
item.description: Here’s how to fix the breakage caused by one of the recent updates to Microsoft Outlook in the Outlook-to-OmniFocus AppleScript included with my SendToOmniFocus spoon.

item.title: Using Spoons in Hammerspoon
item.description: In this second article about Hammerspoon, we look into Spoons, modules written in Lua which can be easily installed and loaded into Hammerspoon to provide ready-to-use functionality. Spoons provide a predefined API to configure and use them. They are also a good way to share your own work with other users.

item.title: Getting Started With Hammerspoon
item.description: This is the first installment of a series of posts about Hammerspoon, a staggeringly powerful automation utility which gives you an amazing degree of control over your Mac, allowing you to automate and control almost anything. In the word of Hammerspoon’s motto: Making the runtime, funtime.
